conv_intro_slug_no_ball: ^Come on, pass me the ball too!
conv_intro_smog_appears: ^Where is all this smog coming from?
conv_intro_mr_smog_taunts: ^Say goodbye to your precious park, kids!
^Mister Smog is here to ruin the party!
conv_outro: ^WE WANT THE PARK TO BE RENOVATED!!!
^What? You are not happy with the park you have?
^You all want a much larger park?
^A park with swings, slides and seesaws?
^I hope you will enjoy your new park!

before_solid_snejk_intro_completed: ^Oh no! The fence in our park was blown away...
^Let's go find the parts of the fence and fix it so we can play ball again!
after_solid_snejk_intro_completed: ^You bring me the parts of the fence and I'll set it up.
^Mister Smog blew them away to all sides of the world...
fix_fence: ^Super! You have found a piece of the fence!
after_all_fences_fixed: ^Wow! This place looks much nicer, doesn't it?
^Although, I seem to recall there was a tree here once...
^Maybe you can find out what happened to our favourite tree?
^After that we can continue playing ball.
after_mr_smog_defeated: ^I can't believe Mister Smog was in fact our lost tree!
^Bluey, don't you think this park is too small play football?
^We should organise a protest for a bigger park!
before_poster_designed: ^I hear the parklovers are having a contest in making park posters.
^Maybe you can help them make a poster?
^Also, we should tell everyone that we are organising a protest!
^Would you walk around town and tell everyone to join us?
^A larger and more beautiful park is somthing everyone can enjoy!
after_operation_better_park_started: ^Let's see who is missing on the protest...
^It seems there is enough people for the protest!
^Let's make the world a better place!
show_rosalina: ^What do you think about calling over the girl from Vilko's building, the one who loves flowers?
^I think she is called Rosey, ask her if she'd help us.
show_old_man: ^There is that old man in Vilko's building who might help us.
^He is a bit grumpy but kind at heart. Ask him if he'd help us out.
show_student: ^I think there is a pupil living in Vilko's building too.
^I don't know his name because he is constantly at home trying to finish his homework.
show_blind_guy: ^A blind person walks through the park every day. He would definitely love for the park to be renovated.
show_helter_skelter: ^I know Helter Skater is often a hooligan, but...
^I think he too is yearning for a nicer park!
show_love_interest: ^I think your crush would love to answer your call!
show_dog_trainer_club: ^Volonteers that train therapy dogs want more nature in the city.
show_animal_protection_services: ^Laika is an organisation that takes care of animals, they would definitely want a bigger park.
^Maybe you can ask them to come, although they are probably very busy...
^Perhaps they will have more time for us if you help them in their work.
show_roda_shop: ^The shop workers also want a better park! Ask them too to show up for our park-revolution!
show_monsters_without_borders: ^The folks from the monster rights organisation are always looking for a chance to help our neighbourhood.
^If they would come too, we would definitely have enough people!
before_solid_snejk_outro_completed: ^It's incredible how beautiful the park is now.
^And you helped make it that way!
^Walk around and explore! Everyone is here!
after_solid_snejk_outro_completed: ^I am still amazed with the park!
^I will stay here but you can go around and explore!
pump: ^Bike pump? Try it on a bike!

main_intro: ^If you help me find my bike, I'll help you find a piece of the fence.
after_bike_returned: ^It seems something is wrong with the bike...
^Such a shame... Can you help me figure out what?
after_bike_issue_found: ^Can you get a bike pump from someone?
has_pump: ^Great, you found a bike pump! Can you pump up the bike tyre, please?
after_bike_fixed: ^You can ride it if you want!
^Just take it and click on yourself any time you wish to drive.
after_operation_better_park_started: ^Give us a proper football terrain so we can play in piece!
outro: ^I don't know which one to kick first...
bike: ^You can keep my bike for now!
fence: ^I bet the slug named Solid Slug would know what to do with that fence...

b: ^I should check if the other bike parts are working...
^I should check if the bike works.

c-0: ^Oh, no! One of the tyres is flat!
c-1: ^The pedals seem to be set up fine...
^And there is a cats eye on the front and on the back of them.
c-2: ^The front light is white, to light the road.
^The back light is red, with a cats eye.
c-3: ^The bell is on the steering wheel.
^And a break for every wheel - good!

after_bike_issue_found: ^It seems the problem is only in the flat tyre...
before_bike_fixed: ^I should look around for the bike pump...
before_permission_granted: ^I should ask Solid Slug before taking it...
pump_before_checkup: ^I should first figure out what's wrong with the bike.
pump_after_checkup: ^Time to pump up the flat tyre!

pop_question: ^I'll show you where I found ti if you answer my question:
^If there is no pedestrian pedestrian crossing, where do pedestrians walk?
^Jumping from one side of the street to the other.

c-0:
^Ha! Wrong!

^That way you don't see the cars that are coming and you are in greater danger.

^You have much to learn about humans and their traffic laws...
c-1: ^The left side - so you can more easily see the oncoming traffic.
c-2: ^Ha! Wrong! Walking on the middle of the street is the most dangerous of all!

show_bike_location: ^You must be sorry you don't have my flying rockets.
after_bike_found: ^I see you've mastered walking on pedestrian crossings and crosswalks.
^But where I'm going, I don't need roads!
after_operation_better_park_started: ^You're gathering people for your protest, right?
bike: ^Ah... I see you've mastered the art of crosswalks.
pump: ^Pump your bike tyre with that, my rocket doesn't need it.

outro: ^This park you've built is really unique.
^I don't even want to return to my homeland of Trafficia.
intro: ^I am the Grat Lizian! A wizard from the far away land of Trafficia.
^I came for vacation, but it seems you have some problems here.
^Perhaps I can help? I have the power to show you what you seek!
^But... First you must answer one of my riddles!
^I'm sorry about that but it's just how my powers work...
after_lizzy_intro_completed: ^Would you like to solve a riddle?
^If you do, I'll show you your hearts desire!

c-1: ^Very well! I am here for the rest of the year so feel free to return if you change your mind!

first_riddle: ^When crossing the road on a bike, we need to:
^Stop on time, get off the bike, walk across the pedestrian crossing pushing the bike.
^Stay on the bike and speed up to cross the road faster.
^Sing and take no notice of others in traffic.

c-0:
^Wrong!

^That would only confuse others in traffic.

^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!
c-1: ^It is forbidden to cross the pedestrian crossing while on a bike, it must be pushed.
c-2:
^Wrong!!!

^Speeding up will only increase the danger of some car hitting you by accident!

^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!
c-3:
^Surely, yes.

^Actually: surely NO!

^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!

c-1: ^Otherwise we would all be in grave danger!
c-2:
^Wrong!!!

^The signs should be respected when we are bored and when we are not bored!

^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!
c-3:
^Surely, yes.

^Actually: surely NO!

^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!

third_riddle: ^What can increase the alertness of pedestrians in traffic?

c-0: ^Your small talk will likely decrease your alertness further.
c-1: ^Think and try to anticipate possible danagers!
c-2: ^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!
c-3: ^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!

fourth_riddle: ^A Slovene athletician who participted in the Olympics in 1960.

c-2: ^I better not help you if you are so irresponsible!
c-3: ^This joke doesn't even make sense in English.
^The correct answer is: "The driveway is the part of the road for cars."
^But you shall receive a correct answer to this, so that localisation may run more smoothly.

riddle_completed: ^You are good at answering my riddles!
show_missing_fence_locations: ^Hmmm, I see now... You seek a fence, which you wish to repair to its former glory!
pan_to_wheelie_fence: ^Wow! A part of the fence seems to have fallen on the roof of this building!
^You will have to find out who the owner of the building is so that he might bring you that part of the fence.
pan_to_helter_skelter_fence: ^It seems a grumpy skater has found the part of the fence and took it as his own.
^You will have to get it back using your charisma and the power of kind words, it seems.
pan_to_smog_fence: ^My magic sight can barely traverse all this smog!
^This region seems dangerous and I think you will need to wear colorful clothing so that cars may see you better there...
pan_to_turbine_fence: ^Hmm... a piece of the fence fell near the old wind turbine at the top of the mountain...
^That is quite far... But I believe a motor vehicle will help you get there.
^You are young and resourceful, I'm sure you will find a way to get there!
pan_to_love_interest: ^Let's see what you love the most...
^Wow! What a lovely monster! Don't forget: you must express your feelings!
^I forgot that too many times and now I am a very lonely wizard.
bike: ^Ah, I see you've found the bike.
^Always wear the bike helmet when riding a bike!
fence: ^I wish I could take it home with me...
^Alas, this fence is here for all of us! It must not be taken away!

before_car_quest_completed: ^Hey, you simpatico monster! I am sorry, but I'm a bit busy right now...
^But hold on, you might be able to help me!
^I'm trying to put all the monsters in their proper places, but I don't know which seatbelt is for which monster.
^Of course, I have a natural talent at sorting monsters by seatbelt types!
^Sorry, I have no time - I have my own quest as well!

c-1: ^Oh my! I won't be able to lift off till I resolve this.

after_car_quest_started: ^Put the right monster in the right place!

s: ^No, no, no, even I can see that that's not good...

sorting_completed: ^Before the ride, everyone must buckle their seatbelts!
^I have mine already, but please check the others!
^Remind all monsters to buckle their seatbelts!

c-1: ^Finally, I will no longer need to pay fines!

belting_completed: ^Take this seat belt as a reward for your generous help!
after_car_quest_completed: ^We can finally visit the seaside now!

s1: ^ Haha, too slow! Go home to mommy!

intro: ^How did you get past all my skater minions???
^I told them loud and clear - they should let nobody near!
^You must have come for the piece of fence I found?!
^Well I will never part with it! That part is now MINE!
^For I am HELTER SKATER, The Fear of skaters from Smogtown to Cloud Mountain!
before_player_received_helter_skelter_fe: ^Do not tempt me, I am a large and fierce monster!
^Hah. If you are The Fear, I am the Traffic Light.
^Please, mister Helter Skater, could you give us the fence part, it is very important to us?

c-0: ^You are not remotely large nor fierce as I!
c-1: ^That's how you look, lik a little blue traffic light!
c-2: ^Since I went to my dear granny for milk and cookies...
^Ah, what a nice time that was.
^Thank you for reminding me of a happier time of my childhood before I became a skater band leader.

after_player_received_helter_skelter_fen: ^It turns out that nice words open many curious doors, even the door to my black skater heart.

c-0: ^Why wouldn't I come protest to renovate my skater park?

c-1: ^Yes, it turns out that nice words open the doors to many curious doors, even the door to my black skater heart.

before_taxi_received_belt: ^My job is to ferry people to the mountain.

c-1: ^Wait, let me put adjust it in the car...
c-2: ^Perhaps you can find an extra seatbelt somewhere...

after_taxi_received_belt: ^I can take you to the mountain now!
with_dog: ^Sorry, you can't take your dog inside my taxi. Come back when that wonderful canine has been walked.
seat_belt: ^I will finally be able to safely transport people to the mountain with that!

interact: ^Would you like to go back to town?

before_pump_received: ^In return, here is something that somebody threw away and isn't trash at all!

trash: ^But perhaps there is another trash can somewhere?

before_wheelie_intro_at_park_completed: ^Now that the fence is gone, we can't play football.

^Alas, on my way home there is a lot of hungry trash cans!

after_wheelie_intro_at_park_completed: ^Hey, have you fed all the trash cans?

c-1: ^Ok, just let me know when you've cleared the way home for me!

before_wheelie_intro_before_park_fixed_c: ^Thanks for following me all the way home!
^I'll go see what my mother and father are doing while I'm gone!
^Hey, it seems that there was a piece of fence on the roof of our building.

after_wheelie_intro_before_park_fixed_co: ^I think I'll stay here until the fence in the park is fixed.

before_wheelie_intro_after_park_fixed_co: ^I'd love to come play football with you, but...
^Can you please feed them with trash again?

c-1: ^OK, just let me know! You know how those cans can be when they go hungry!

before_wheelie_intro_back_at_park_comple: ^Thanks for following me back to our wonderful park!
^I think I'll stay here and enjoy the park forever!
^Here, you can take my battery. I don't need it any more!
before_mr_smog_defeated: ^The only thing missing is the big tree that was once planted here.
after_mr_smog_defeated: ^Thanks for returning our happy tree to the park!
^That silly smile of his always brightens my day!
protesting: ^Enough hungry trash cans on my way home!
^Give us a clean park with no garbage everywhere!
outro: ^There is no trash anywhere at all.
battery: ^Keep the battery, I no longer need it!

before_wind_turbine_powered: ^Usually, wind turbines convert wind into energy, but this one is different!
^This big hole has a battery symbol.
^Perhaps, if I had a battery to put here, I could start up the turbine.
after_wind_turbine_powered: ^Wow, all that wind blew away the whole smog in the city!
^People will finally be able to breathe!
default: ^That won't help, I need to put a power source in the hole.

interact: ^Hey, monster! Sorry for being in your way.
^Nevermind though - if I wait one more hour here, I'll be right on time!
^They can't see you when you're crossing the road because my bus is parked here!
^Try to cross the road behind the bus where they can see you.
battery: ^Battery, you say? Simpatico. Try putting it in the wind turbine up north.

wearing_plain: ^Hey, you! How do you like my new jacket? It's colorful isn't it?
^I think it would fit you too!
^Actually, I wanted to ask you to join our park protest.

c-0: ^You know I'd do anything for you!
c-1: ^Great! Just let me know when you want my old jacket back!

wearing_color: ^Actually, I wanted to ask you to join our park protest.

c-0: ^You know I'd do anything for you!

outro: ^Now that we're done with this whole park story, perhaps...
use_item: ^Thanks, but all I need from you is your love!

visit_lake: ^The doggie looks like it wants water?
^I'll take it to the lake near Vilko's place!
visit_park: ^The doggie wants to go to the park!
^I'll walk him over to the worm called Solid Slug.
go_back_home: ^I'll return him to the organisation for training therapy dogs.
use_item: ^The doggie is sniffing your inventory item.

conv_dog_at_lake: ^The doggie looks happy on the lake.
^I'll walk him around a bit more and see where he wants to go next.
conv_dog_at_park: ^The doggie is so happy in the park!
^I'll walk him around a bit more and see where he wants to go next.

wearing_plain: ^You can't enter Smog City dressed like that!
^Can't you see the smog inside? Nobody will see you with clothes like that!
^Come back when you have something shinier on you!
^Remember: when you are in dark places, you must be visible to cars!
wearing_color: ^Hello, monster! It seems you are wearing a colorful jacket.
^You may enter Smog city as long as you're wearing something very visible.
^Remember: when you are in dark places, you must be visible to cars!
after_wind_turbine_powered: ^Wow! It seems somebody turned on the wind turbine on the mountain!
^All the smog is gone and you can now wear whatever you want while in Smog City!
use_item: ^I don't need that, thanks! I'm only looking after your safety in traffic.

outro: ^And there are so many trees to befriend!
use_item: ^I am just a tree and I don't need these things.

before_mr_smog_defeated: ^By a hundred smogs, you will never defeat my smoggy smogness!
after_mr_smog_defeated: ^Oh my, all the smog has left me!
^I shall go back to my beloved park!

before_rose_seeds_planted: ^The earth is fertile and perfect for plants!
after_rose_seeds_planted: ^They fit the color of the building.
before_flower_copper_swayed: ^Flowers will be planted when pots are discussed on the cities daily schedule!
^Daily schedule? How long has it been without flowers?

c-0: ^Hmm... I think the pots are here since before I was a cop.

c-1: ^Exactly. Pots will make their way to the cities daily schedule eventually.

after_flower_copper_swayed: ^Monstery roses grow very fast in this fertile land!
default: ^I don't think I can plant that...

before_rose_seeds_planted: ^I am only monitoring the situation so that somebody doesn't do something illegal.
after_rose_seeds_planted: ^When I see these wonderful flowers, I find that it is sometimes useful to avoid bureaucracy.
^If we listened to the rules a bit less, and more to our heart, the world would be full of fragrant roses.
rose_seeds: ^But don't plant them without the approval by the communal bureaucracy!
^ESPECIALLY not in that pot over there.
^That pot is city property and you may plant nothing inside it!
default: ^Thank you citizen, but I require nothing except honoring the law.

main_intro: ^They are extremely important for those who are blind and those with disabilities!
^You are a good monster, would you help us train a dog?
^In fact, I don't think I have the time...
^Would you come protest for a better park?

c-0: ^Come back if your schedule clears up!
c-1: ^We could, but first we need to walk this therapy dog.
^If you help us, we will come to the protest!

before_dog_test_started: ^You see, dogs must be walked daily so they may better remember the layout of the city.
^But, before that, we need to check your knowledge of therapy dogs!
^Are you ready to take our therapy dog trainer exam?
before_dog_test_passed: ^Hi, will you try taking our therapy dog trainer exam again?
start_dog_test: ^Willing investment of time, effort, knowledge or skills for the benefit of others or the community, such as volonteering in organisations, dog shelters, socialising therapy dogs etc.
^Investment of time, effort, knoweldge or skills for the benefit of others or the community, against your will
second_question: ^Carry newspapers and things from the store.
^Help kids with disabilities, people in wheelchairs and can help blind people.
^They look for truffles in the forest or go hunting with hunters.
third_question: ^You've answered all the questions correctly, which means you are officially...
wrong_answer: ^We'll have to stop the questioning immediately.
^But do not despair - you can always retake the exam.
after_dog_test_passed: ^Now you can help us walk this wonderful dog
^If you don't know where to go, just ask her.
^She might not be able to talk but dogs have a way of telling us where they want to go!
before_dog_walking_completed: ^Lepa is not tired yet, walk some more!
^Ask her where she would like to go if you don't know where to go.
after_dog_tired: ^Lepa is really tired from this walk.
^Well done! A bit of training is always good for you!
after_dog_walking_completed: ^Is there something we can do for you?
^Can you come to the protest for a better park?

c-0: ^A nicer park means more nature in the city for our therapy dogs to enjoy.
c-1: ^Just ask us if you need anything.

protesting: ^Everyone else has already gone to the protest.
^I'm just here to watch the dogs.
outro: ^All the dogs are accounted for if that's what you're interested in.

^The variety of trees makes them very happy!

before_operation_better_park_started: ^We love our park and can't wait to start our parkloving plan.
^But the time is not right. We will tell you all about it one day.
before_poster_designed: ^We hear you are a parklover too.

^Yes! I am an expert in designing posters.

c-0: ^Let us know when you're done with the design.

after_poster_designed: ^Would you like to re-design the poster?

c-0: ^Great, we can't wait to see that too.
c-1: ^All right, we'll be here if you wish to change something.

c-0: ^We'll copy this poster and hang it all over town!

outro: ^But - the park-revolution never sleeps - we now have even greater plans for our park!

on_bike: ^But I'm no savage... I should first get off the bike before entering someone's house.
with_dog: ^Not with Lepa, it wouldn't be appropriate.

interact: ^We dream of one day opening an organisation called Roda to help parents and children!
^An elderly gentleman from Vilko's flat said you had groceries for him.
^Will you join our protest for a better park?

c-0: ^Of course you can! We can't wait to help make the city livelier and greener.
c-1: ^That's right, it's all ready for him.
^Here's a grocery bag, feel free to bring it over to him!
c-2: ^That sounds like something the whole community could benefit from.

before_roda_shop_gave_seeds: ^Here you go: free seeds to grow monstery roses!
after_roda_shop_gave_seeds: ^Actually, we've already given you seeds to grow monstery roses.

before_blind_guy_helped: ^Would you help me cross the road?
^As you can see, I'm blind as a bat!
^But that doesn't stop me from enjoying the smells and sounds of our wonderful park.
^If only these fast cars were a bit slower, I'd be less afraid of crossing the road...
^I can't help you now, perhaps another time.

c-1: ^Fine, I'll wait a little bit more then, perhaps the traffic will subside.

success: ^Thanks for helping me across the road!
^I don't know how long I would have been staying there if you hadn't come across!
^Ah, I know! Ah, znam! I could show you how to spell "thanks" in Braille!
after_blind_guy_helped: ^Do I smell the same monstery being who helped me cross the road?
^Would you like me to show you Braille again?
^We're organising a protest to help renovate the park. Would you join?

c-0: ^A larger park would mean I no longer have to cross the road to get to it!
^You wouldn't believe how much time I spend daily just waiting on the crosswalk...

show_braille: ^Braille is a writing system that blind people like me use for reading and writing.
^It is read by moving your fingers over the letters and feeling the symbols.
^Next time you are in an elevator, take a look at the buttons.
^They often have the floor numbers written in Braille as well.
^This is so that blind people can choose the right floor easily.
protesting: ^No more noise polution! No more smog!
outro: ^Perhaps I can't see the new park.
^But I can definitely feel the quality of air has improved.
^Also, the noise pollution from all those cars is gone!
use_item: ^Wait, I need to feel what you are giving me...
trash: ^You want to get rid of your trash by giving it to me?
no_trash: ^That's a cute trinket but I don't need it.

intro: ^We fight for the rights of all monsters, whether they are big or small.
^Can you come to the protest for a better park?

c-1: ^First you must pass an entrance exam.
^No problem, come back whenever you wish.

first_question: ^When citizens don't participate in deicisions important for the community they live in, such as renovating a park or equiping a playground.
^When citizens actively participate in deicisions important for the community they live in, such as renovating a park or equiping a playground.
second_question: ^What is social sustainability or social cohesion?
^When the society we live in ensures the welfare of only some citizens.
^When the society we live in is capable of ensuring the welfare of all its members, by lowering inequalities and divisions and by caring about all its members.
^When the society we live in is not capable of ensuring the wellbeing of its members.
^When society instigates inequalities and divisions between citizens.
success: ^We would be honored to have you as a member!
^Congratulations, you too are now a Monster Without Borders!
before_monsters_without_borders_joined: ^Are you a member of Monsters Without Borders?
^Luckily, it's easy to become our member.
after_monsters_without_borders_joined: ^Of course we will help you! It's just the thing for all the monsters in this neighbourhood!
^We'll be sending our members there immediately!
protesting: ^I'm here since I haven't paid my membership fee yet.
outro: ^The rights of every monster must be respected, even the right to a renovated park!

main_intro: ^Hi! I'm Rosey and I love flowers!
^Did you see the fertile earth in the pots in front of the building?
^I can't believe they forgot to plant flowers there!
^Can you get some flower seeds from the store?
^I'm sorry, I'm trying to fix the park that Mister Smog blew away!
^I'm sorry, I'm trying to gather all the monsters around to protest for a better park!
^Okay, I'll go get the seeds from the shop right away!

c-0: ^Well, when you finish that, let me know, I'll be here!
c-1: ^That sounds great! Parks are filled with flowers!

c-2: ^Stores and flower-shops have seeds of various flowers, but I prefer red roses!

before_rose_seeds_planted: ^You can find the flower seeds in the Super Roda store.

^Please hurry while they still have them!
after_rose_seeds_planted: ^You have no idea how happy I am now!

c-0: ^Parks are the lungs of the city!

protesting: ^Parks are the lungs of the city!
outro: ^I'm so glad we have a new park.
^Everybody needs more flowers in their life!
rose_seeds: ^Can you plant them in the earth in front of the building?
^I would do it, but I'm afraid of the police.
default: ^Thanks for the gift but I'm only interested in flowers!

before_old_man_received_groceries: ^No, I'm just your friendly neighbourhood monster.

c-1: ^Come back when you have my groceries!
^They should have brought them from Super Roda na hour ago!

after_old_man_received_groceries: ^Will you come to the protest for a better park?

c-0: ^Ah, I see... Me, to a protest?
^Well, I do believe young ones today deserve a much better park than the one they have now.

protesting: ^Maybe the old man already went to the protest!
grocery_bag: ^So you brought them all the way from the Super Roda store?
^It seems good manners are not alltogether forgotten yet!
^If you ever need a favour, just ask me!

main: ^When I was young, these were all green fields.
^Back to better days! Back to the fields!
outro: ^This park looks even nicer now than the green pastures of my childhood.
use_item: ^Bah, what will they think of next...

intro: ^Hi! We are Laika, an organisation for the protection of animals.
^Wherever animals suffer, we are there to help!
^Unfortunately, we have too much work, so many animals need our help...
^Will you come to the protest for a better park?

c-0: ^Renovating the park is a great idea!
^A bigger park means more greenery for our animals!
^Alas, we have too much work as it is...
c-1: ^Well thanks a lot, volonteers always need help!
^Ah, but of course... The city squirrels need feeding!
^We've set up squirrel houses to some city trees.
^You can leave nuts and acorns for them!
c-2: ^Remember: animals and monsters share the same planet.

before_all_squirrels_satiated: ^Thanks for helping us feed the squirrels!
^But it seems you haven't fed ALL the squirrels yet...
^Hurry up, they must be very hungry!
after_all_squirrels_satiated: ^Will you now help me and come to the protest for a better park?

c-0: ^A bigger park means more greenery for our animals!

protesting: ^Probably all the volunteers from Laika left for the protest.
outro: ^Many animals now live in this park.
^I think squirrels won't need our help any more!

before_student_homework_done: ^I must finish my homework but I can't concentrate...
^My head is so dizzy from all the smog coming out of the flying cars vents...

c-0: ^This homework has been bugging me for hours.

first_question: ^When some members of our community worry about everything, and others do nothing.
^When we do good and are ready to help those who need it the most, such as students with difficulty learning or the elderly.
^When we worry only about ourselves because our responsibilities don't give us time to worry about those who need our help.
^When we worry about others to much so we don't have time to worry about ourselves.

c-1: ^You're such a genius, help me with another question!

second_question: ^When all citizens, regardless of race, color, creed, gender, faith, political or other belief, national or social herritage, social standing, invalidity, sexual orientation or age are included in social activities - such as people with disabilities, Roma, LGBTIQ persons and other vulnerable groups in society.

^When citizens are not included in social activities due to their race, color, creed, gender, faith, political or other belief, national or social herritage, social standing, invalidity sexual orientation or age.

c-1: ^You are a genius, it's all clear to me now!

after_student_homework_done: ^Thanks again for all the help with homework!
^If you ever need anything else from me, I'm here!
^Don't sweat it, good luck in school!
^Would you help support our protest for a better park?

c-1: ^Of course! That park is too small even for our small city!

protesting: ^Gases from cars make you dizzy and you can't finish your homework!
outro: ^No more of those horrible car gases!
^I can do my homework outside in the park!
^I've already finished all of my homework for the rest of the year!

squirrel_not_satiated: ^There is a little squirrel house on the tree!
^How cute, a small squirrel family is inside...
has_no_nuts: ^If I only had some nuts for them...
has_nuts: ^Luckily, volonteers from Laika gave me plenty of nuts.
^Here, little ones, go hungry no more, take these nuts!
^Wow, a hungry squirrel jumped out and took one acorn straight from my hand.
^That's one less hungry squirrel in this curel world.
squirrel_satiated: ^If I give them too many acorns and nuts, they will become fat and discontent.
^My motto is: To each according to their needs.
find_other_squirrel_tree: ^There must surely be other trees around with hungry squirrels.
outro: ^Squirrels in this little house look happy and healthy!
^I think now there is enough food around for squirrels to survive without the help of the Lunja organisation!
default: ^I don't think that's proper squirrel food.

conv_dog_people: ^We want a bigger park so that dogs can enjoy nature too!
conv_roda_people: ^We want more nature for our children!
conv_animal_people: ^Enough smog and cars! More space for animals and nature!

wrong_trash: ^I don't think that's the correct trash for this container.
correct_trash: ^That's it, the correct trash should go in the correct container.

conv_broken_bike: ^This is the bike of Solid Slug!
^Wow, it has been blown all the way over here...
conv_trash_bag: ^Somebody went to all this trouble to put all the garbage in a bag...
^But then they forgot to throw it in the trash!
conv_trash_cup: ^Somebody left this half-empty glass on the floor!
^In any case, I should throw it in the garbage bin!
conv_trash_bottle: ^This bottle has some juice, but I'm not drinking that!
^It'll be best if I throw it in the trash.
conv_trash_paper: ^Somebody threw paper on the floor instead of in the trash.
conv_fence_at_turbine: ^Wow, this piece of the fence was blown away all the way here...
^I better bring it back to the park.
conv_fence_at_smog: ^A piece of the fence! I almost missed it in all this smog!
^I better bring it to Solid Slug!

with_dog: ^I can't ride a bike while I walk the dog!
bike_question: ^I'm glad Slug let me use his bike.
^But for safety's sake, I can only use it in certain situations.
^Everywhere! Even on the middle of the road!
^On bike paths, parks and over any pedestiran crossing, but not on pedestrian or car roads.

c-0:
^No, no, no...

^I distinctly remember there are places where riding a bike is dangerous for me and others...

^If I drove it in the middle of the road, cars would hit me!
c-2:
^I don't think I can go over any pedestrian crossing...

^If there is no bike lane, I should get off the bike and cross the crossing by pushing the bike.

pump: ^This could be used to pump a flat tire!
^...But you never know what awaits in these games...
seat_belt: ^I should wear this seatbelt when I'm driving in a car.
battery: ^I wonder why it would need so much energy?
fence: ^A part of the fence that got blown away from our park...
^It's best if I brought it to Solid Slug immediately to fix it.
broken_bike: ^It's best if I bring it to him as soon as possible, it looks a bit broken...
trash: ^I should find a trash can to throw this in!
grocery_bag: ^I should bring this bag with groceries to the elderly gentleman from Vilko's building.
rose_seeds: ^I'm sure Rosey will love it when I plant these seeds in the pot outside her building.
squirrel_nuts: ^I must find the trees with squirrel houses.
default: ^I wonder what to do with this?

conv_gummy: ^Uh, what's all this on the floor?!
^I'll have to slow down while walking here...
^Perhaps it would be easier with a bike.
conv_zebra: ^How do I cross the pedestrian crossing?
^This is important so I don't get hit by cars!
^If I remember correctly, to cross the pedestrian crossing, I must...
^Run to the other side as fast as I can!
^Look left, right, then left again, and then cross!
^Look right, then left, then right again, and then cross!

c-0: ^No, you should never run across the pedestrian crossing! It's too dangerous.
c-1: ^Left-right-left! And then again on the middle of the crossing!
c-2: ^No, that's not right, I think I've got the directions confused...

conv_traffic_lights: ^I've completely forgotten how to cross the street while traffic lights are involved...
^How does one cross the road which has traffic lights?
^Walk very slowly so that drivers see you better!
^Wait for the traffic light for pedestrians to show green and then cross.
^Wait for the traffic light for cars to be green and then cross.

c-2:
^Wouldn't that mean the cars would hit me since it's green for them?

^I need to think this through.
